thanks: ^King: Thank you for all of your help, brave knight.
grumpy: ^King: You dare talk to me after supporting dastardly pirates over your own King and country?
^King: What will I be without a crown?
^King: You have ruined the entire faire.
candle_holder_request: ^King: We're holding a banquet at the faire and you know what would make it look really authentic?
^King: A Medieval-style candle holder on the table.
^King: There used to be a prosperous village here in the Medieval era, you know.
^King: I'm sure you could find all sorts of things down there.
candle_holder_retrieved: ^King: With a little polishing, that will do just fine.
chalice_request: ^King: I'm imagining the banquet now, and...
^King: Ah, yes, I can see myself at the top of the table.
^King: I'm welcoming everyone to the feast.
^King: Please get me one before the banquet.

c-0: ^May light rest upon your shoulders, go forth with honor.
c-1: ^Please? It won't be the same without one.

chalice_retrieved: ^King: Fit for a king, one might say.
^Now the banquet may begin with a splendourous display of wealth...
crown_given_to_pirate: ^King: You dare give MY crown to such a... a SCOUNDREL?
^King: What did you do that for?
^King: I clearly can't trust you with anything.
ask_for_crown: ^King: You know, there's one more thing that would be absolutely befitting of an outfit such as mine own.
^King: Every real king needs a crown.
^King: And as of yet, it seems to be missing.
^King: Peasant, please fetch me a crown.
crown_retrieved: ^King: Thanks to all your help, the faire will be a massive success.
